title: Fix broken portfolio image paths across all categories

requirements.text: Fix the PortfolioGallery component to correctly reference portfolio images from the frontend/public/assets/generated directory, ensuring all 120 images (30 per category: Home, Commercial, Office, Hotels) display properly without broken image icons

quotes: Images in the portfolio doesn't load

acceptanceCriteria: All 120 portfolio images display correctly without broken image icons
Images load properly in all 4 categories (Home, Commercial, Office, Hotels)
Each category displays exactly 30 images with titles and descriptions
Images open in lightbox dialog when clicked
No console errors related to missing or invalid image paths

requirements.text: Verify that the portfolio image filenames in the component match the exact generated filenames in frontend/public/assets/generated, using proper public asset paths (e.g., /assets/generated/filename.png) instead of relative imports

quotes: Images in the portfolio doesn't load

acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio component uses correct public asset URL format for all images
Image filenames in component match generated asset filenames exactly
Images are served from the public directory without import errors
Browser network tab shows successful image loads with 200 status codes

constraints: Do not modify the backend/main.mo file
Do not modify any files in frontend/src/components/ui
Maintain the existing 4-category structure (Home, Commercial, Office, Hotels)
Keep the tabbed interface and lightbox dialog functionality
nonGoals: Redesigning the portfolio gallery layout or interaction patterns
Adding new portfolio categories beyond the existing 4
Changing the number of images per category
Modifying the contact form or backend submission logic
Updating any other sections of the website
